datafield.subfield: Micromechanical Simulation of Fines Content Effect of Soils Using the Discrete Element Method
A micromechanical simulation is carried out to study the effect of the fines content on the mechanical property of sand-silt-clay mixed soils by using the Discrete Element Method.
